title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.23 - Clearance around fire hydrants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.23 - Clearance around fire hydrants

State Regulations

No persons shall leave standing, or cause or permit to be
left standing, any automobile or other vehicle, or stop or cause to be stopped
any automobile or other vehicle, within 20 feet of any fire hydrant maintained
by the commission or the City of Albany on lands under the control and
management of the commission, except to permit of the immediate movement of
contents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
